modName: Player Home - Katla's Farm Reloaded - no more updates
summary: I really like Katla's Farm, but unfortunately it isn't possible to obtain one of the buildings, so I rearranged the two already existing buildings (Katla's Farm + Stables) and added my „Solitude Farmhouse“.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://up.picr.de/21030286ys.jpg[/img][size=3]

I really like Katla's Farm, but unfortunately it isn't possible to obtain one of the buildings, so I rearranged the two already existing buildings (Katla's Farm + Stables) and added my „Solitude Farmhouse“.
[/size]
[u][size=4]Features:[/size][/u]

Playerhome - Solitude Farmhouse
more plants + animals
apple trees!
General Stores Sorting-System for:
- stolen goods
- tanning
- smithing
- smelting
- weapons
- armor
- foodstores


[u][size=4]Requirements:

[/size][/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340/?]General Stores by Harvey 2112[/url]


[b][u][size=4]Get the key![/size][/u][/b]

Just look out for the corpse of poor Mervin Olpert as shown in the picture.
...you can get wet feet when searching for the corpse.
...it's hidden behind a few bushes.


[size=3]You are a busy Dragonborn and can't keep all your abodes clean and tidied up by yourselfe?
This Expansion adds a simple groundskeeper called Freya to your Dragonborns Farm in Solitude, so the interieur doesn't seem so deserted.[/size]
[size=6]                                       [b]↓
[/b][/size]
[img]http://up.picr.de/21150117yq.jpg[/img]


[size=4]                                                          [u]Special thanks to:[/u][/size]

                                                                       [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2723408/?]Harvey 2112[/url] for his General Stores
                                             [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3815427/?]ChickenDownUnder[/url] for his apple trees out of his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15108/?]Harvestables[/url]-Resource 
                                                                      [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4672007/?]DarkFox127[/url] for his youtube tutorials


[img]http://up.picr.de/21030524hx.jpg[/img]
author: RanulNim
